about_the_game:
Mistress Aria's potion shop is booming! She needs your help to make sure she can create, package, and ship the potions on time every night to keep her customers happy. While Mistress Aria researches new potions to sell, you're in charge of restocking the ingredient inventory! Will you exceed her expectations and build a strong relationship with her, or shirk your duties and never experience her jiggle physics?

The game is presented in 2 distinct stages in every level, the visual novel, and the potion creation mini-game.

Visual Novel Level Features:

  • Visual Novel elements

  • Dating-Sim elements

  • A very light narrative

  • First person camera, ability to free roam

  • Dialog choices affect your relationship with Mistress Aria, but don't worry - you can always replay the same level

Potion Making Level Features:

  • Interactive Potion Creation using the ingredients you purchase and the recipes you unlock

  • Stock management

  • First person camera. No ability to free roam, but ability to pan left and right

  • Potion creation performance affects your relationship with Mistress Aria, but don't worry - you can always retry the same level

Once your relationship is high enough with Mistress Aria:

  • Interactive explicit Sexual Content (interactive via physics controlled with the mouse)

  • A free roam feature for precise camera placement

  • Many unlockable sexy poses and animations to ask Mistress Aria to be in

What the Game Does NOT Feature

  • No character creator -- you are unnamed and will never see your own character model

  • No ability to skip to the explicit content. You MUST build your relationship with Mistress Aria first.

  • No branching narrative -- you either do well, or you don't.

  • No 2 person sex acts -- ie you will never see your character having sex with Aria. You control tools (a hand, toys) to please her.

  • 24/7 support -- this project is solo developed. Discord is around to gather issues and feature requests, but I am 1 lass with a fulltime job, so I cannot always be around to help.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains full nudity (including uncensored female nipples & genitalia) as well as sexually explicit interactions/ animations. All characters depicted in the game are well over the age of 18.
